title: Masquerade Costume
description:
masquerade costume, garment and headcovering, cotton, porcupine quills, African, stored in box; (Simmons); garment stored w/86.100.21,27
stripwoven, red, black and white; head covering, cotton, white, with eyeholes and nose stuffed with porcupine quills
creditline: Gift of Roberta and Richard Simmons
